query.query: {"pigql":"b = load \"pipeline_trending5\"; b = filter b by 'Opportunity.IsClosed' == \"false\"; b = filter b by {{column(Pushed_Opportunities_1.selection, [\"Opportunity.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(Neglected_Opportunit_1.selection, [\"Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(StageName_1.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.StageName\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(RecordType_Name_1.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.RecordType.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(stagename_dropdown.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.StageName\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(Owner_Role_Name_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Owner.Role.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(Account_Name_1.selection, [\"Account.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Account.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(Owner_Name_1.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Owner.Name\")}}; b = filter b by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Month', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; b = group b by ('OpportunityId', 'StageName'); b = foreach b generate 'OpportunityId', 'StageName', avg(sum('Duration')) over ([..] partition by 'StageName') as 'avg_Stage_Duration', first('Opportunity.Name') as 'Opportunity.Name', first('Stage.SortOrder') as 'Stage.SortOrder', first('Time_In_Current_Stage.Duration_Seconds') as 'Time_In_Current_Stage.Duration_Seconds', first('Opportunity.Amount') as 'Opportunity.Amount'; b = foreach b generate 'OpportunityId', 'StageName', first('Opportunity.Name') as 'Opportunity.Name', sum('avg_Stage_Duration') as 'avg_Stage_Duration', first('Stage.SortOrder') as 'Stage.SortOrder', first('Time_In_Current_Stage.Duration_Seconds') as 'Time_In_Current_Stage.Duration_Seconds', first('Opportunity.Amount') as 'Opportunity.Amount', case when first('Time_In_Current_Stage.Duration_Seconds')-86400 > sum('avg_Stage_Duration') then \"Stalled\" else \"Not Stalled\" end as 'Status'; b = filter b by 'Status' == \"Stalled\"; b = group b by all; b = foreach b generate count() as 'count', avg('Opportunity.Amount') as 'avg_Opportunity.Amount';","measures":[["count","*"],["avg","Opportunity.Amount"]]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"pipeline_trending5\"; q = filter q by 'Opportunity.IsClosed' == \"false\"; q = filter q by {{column(Neglected_Opportunit_1.selection, [\"Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(StageName_1.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.StageName\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(RecordType_Name_1.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.RecordType.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(stagename_dropdown.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.StageName\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(Owner_Role_Name_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Owner.Role.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(Account_Name_1.selection, [\"Account.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Account.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(Owner_Name_1.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Owner.Name\")}}; q = filter q by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Month', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; q = group q by 'Opportunity.Name'; q = foreach q generate 'Opportunity.Name' as 'Opportunity.Name', sum('IsPushed') as 'IsPushed'; q = filter q by 'IsPushed' > 0; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate avg('IsPushed') as 'avg_IsPushed';","measures":[["avg","IsPushed"]],"groups":[]}

{"pigql":"b = load \"pipeline_trending5\"; b = filter b by 'Opportunity.IsClosed' == \"false\"; b = filter b by {{column(Pushed_Opportunities_1.selection, [\"Opportunity.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(Neglected_Opportunit_1.selection, [\"Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(StageName_1.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.StageName\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(RecordType_Name_1.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.RecordType.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(stagename_dropdown.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.StageName\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(Owner_Role_Name_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Owner.Role.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(Account_Name_1.selection, [\"Account.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Account.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(Owner_Name_1.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Owner.Name\")}}; b = filter b by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Month', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; b = group b by ('OpportunityId', 'StageName'); b = foreach b generate 'OpportunityId', 'StageName', avg(sum('Duration')) over ([..] partition by 'StageName') as 'avg_Stage_Duration', first('Opportunity.Name') as 'Opportunity.Name', first('Stage.SortOrder') as 'Stage.SortOrder', first('Time_In_Current_Stage.Duration_Seconds') as 'Time_In_Current_Stage.Duration_Seconds', first('Opportunity.Amount') as 'Opportunity.Amount'; b = foreach b generate 'OpportunityId', 'StageName', first('Opportunity.Name') as 'Opportunity.Name', sum('avg_Stage_Duration') as 'avg_Stage_Duration', first('Stage.SortOrder') as 'Stage.SortOrder', first('Time_In_Current_Stage.Duration_Seconds') as 'Time_In_Current_Stage.Duration_Seconds', first('Opportunity.Amount') as 'sum_Opportunity.Amount', case when first('Time_In_Current_Stage.Duration_Seconds')-86400 > sum('avg_Stage_Duration') then \"Stalled\" else \"Not Stalled\" end as 'Status'; b = filter b by 'Status' == \"Stalled\"; b = order b by 'sum_Opportunity.Amount' desc; b = limit b 100;","measures":[["sum","Opportunity.Amount"]],"groups":["Opportunity.Name"],"order":[[-1,{"ascending":false}]]}

{"pigql":"q = load \"pipeline_trending5\"; q = filter q by {{column(StageName_1.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asEquality(\"StageNamePrev\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(RecordType_Name_1.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.RecordType.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(stagename_dropdown.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asEquality(\"StageName\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(Owner_Role_Name_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Owner.Role.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(Account_Name_1.selection, [\"Account.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Account.Name\")}}; q = filter q by {{column(Owner_Name_1.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Owner.Name\")}}; q = filter q by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Month', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; q = filter q by 'Stage_isUpdated' == \"1\"; q = group q by 'StageName'; q = foreach q generate 'StageName' as 'StageName', count() as 'count', avg('Stage.SortOrder') as 'Stage.SortOrder'; q = order q by 'Stage.SortOrder' asc;","measures":[["count","*"]],"groups":["StageName"]}

{"pigql":"a = load \"opportunity5\"; a = filter a by 'IsClosed' == \"false\"; a = filter a by {{column(RecordType_Name_1.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"RecordType.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(stagename_dropdown.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asEquality(\"StageName\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(Owner_Role_Name_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Role.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(Account_Name_1.selection, [\"Account.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Account.Name\")}}; a = filter a by {{column(Owner_Name_1.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Owner.Name\")}}; a = filter a by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; b = load \"pipeline_trending5\"; b = filter b by {{column(RecordType_Name_1.selection, [\"RecordType.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.RecordType.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(stagename_dropdown.selection, [\"StageName\"]).asEquality(\"StageName\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(Owner_Role_Name_1.selection, [\"Owner.Role.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Owner.Role.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(Account_Name_1.selection, [\"Account.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Account.Name\")}}; b = filter b by {{column(Owner_Name_1.selection, [\"Owner.Name\"]).asEquality(\"Opportunity.Owner.Name\")}}; b = filter b by date('Opportunity.CloseDate_Year', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Month', 'Opportunity.CloseDate_Day') in [{{cell(time_dropdown.selection, 0, \"current\").asObject()}}]; b = filter b by 'Stage.IsClosed' == \"false\"; b = group b by ('OpportunityId', 'StageName'); b = foreach b generate 'OpportunityId' as 'OpportunityId', 'StageName' as 'StageName', sum('Duration') as 'sum_Duration', first('Stage.SortOrder') as 'Stage.SortOrder'; c = group a by 'StageName' full, b by 'StageName'; c = foreach c generate coalesce(a['StageName'],b['StageName']) as 'StageName', avg(a['Time_In_Current_Stage.Duration_Seconds'])/86400 as 'Open Opportunities', avg(b['sum_Duration'])/86400 as 'Historical Average', coalesce(first(a['Stage.SortOrder']),first(b['Stage.SortOrder'])) as 'Stage.SortOrder'; c = order c by 'Stage.SortOrder' asc;","measures":[["count","*","Historical Average"],["count","*","Open Opportunities"]],"groups":["StageName"]}

time_dropdown.label: Time Period Dropdown
values: {"display":"This Month","current":"\"current month\"..\"current month\"","prior":"\"current month - 1 year\"..\"current month - 1 year\"","current_benchmark":"\"current month\"..\"current day\"","prior_benchmark":"\"current month - 1 year\"..\"current day - 1 year\"","current_compact":[["month",0],["month",0]]}

{"display":"This Quarter","current":"\"current quarter\"..\"current quarter\"","prior":"\"current quarter - 1 year\"..\"current quarter - 1 year\"","current_benchmark":"\"current quarter\"..\"current day\"","prior_benchmark":"\"current quarter - 1 year\"..\"current day - 1 year\"","current_compact":[["quarter",0],["quarter",0]]}

{"display":"This Year","current":"\"current year\"..\"current year\"","prior":"\"current year - 1 year\"..\"current year - 1 year\"","current_benchmark":"\"current year\"..\"current day\"","prior_benchmark":"\"current year - 1 year\"..\"current day - 1 year\"","current_compact":[["year",0],["year",0]]}

{"display":"Next Month","current":"\"1 month ahead\"..\"1 month ahead\"","prior":"\"1 month ahead - 1 year\"..\"1 month ahead - 1 year\"","current_benchmark":"\"1 month ahead\"..\"1 month ahead\"","prior_benchmark":"\"1 month ahead - 1 year\"..\"1 month ahead - 1 year\"","current_compact":[["month",1],["month",1]]}

{"display":"Next Quarter","current":"\"1 quarter ahead\"..\"1 quarter ahead\"","prior":"\"1 quarter ahead - 1 year\"..\"1 quarter ahead - 1 year\"","current_benchmark":"\"1 quarter ahead\"..\"1 quarter ahead\"","prior_benchmark":"\"1 quarter ahead - 1 year\"..\"1 quarter ahead - 1 year\"","current_compact":[["quarter",1],["quarter",1]]}

{"display":"Next Year","current":"\"1 year ahead\"..\"1 year ahead\"","prior":"\"1 year ahead - 1 year\"..\"1 year ahead - 1 year\"","current_benchmark":"\"1 year ahead\"..\"1 year ahead\"","prior_benchmark":"\"1 year ahead - 1 year\"..\"1 year ahead - 1 year\"","current_compact":[["year",1],["year",1]]}

parameters.text: Which Opportunities got pushed the most?
Current stage is at least 1 day longer than the stage's historical average
Opportunities that have not been touched in 60 days
Click on a stage to view how opportunities moved on to different stages from the selected stage
